Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista CYSC Flex reagent cartridge
Dimension Vista Cystatin C Control L
Dimension Vista Cystatin C Control H
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension Vista CYSC reagent cartridge, calibrator, and control for quantitative determination of cystatin C in serum and plasma using immunochemical light scatter on the Dimension Vista System
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative determination of cystatin C in human serum, heparinized plasma or EDTA plasma to aid diagnosis and treatment of renal diseases; calibrator for Cystatin C and Microalbumin methods; controls for intralaboratory quality assessment on Dimension Vista System
